amendment.description: To remove privatized highways from consideration in apportioning highway funding among States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1759 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.

action.text: Amendment SA 1759 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S1593-1594, S1595-1596; text: CR S1593) To remove privatized highways from consideration in apportioning highway funding among States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1759 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1759 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1759 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.
